EmailTemplate.name: Business Information Request Response
EmailTemplate.subject: CONFIRMATION - Business Request Form
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you! Your request has been received.
As a reminder, your request will be answered from 8:30 a.m. - 5:30 p.m., Monday through Friday (closed on holidays). Requests will be answered in the order they were received.
We thank you for your interest.
Sincerely,
Idaho Central Credit Union
